docs.text: Class: DataSubstrate Represents a data substrate for Bridge2AI data. This may be a high-level data structure or a specific implementation of that structure. Interpret as "data, in this form or format", as compared to DataStandard, which refers to the set of rules defining a standard. For example, data in TSV format is represented as a DataSubstrate but the concept of TSV format is a DataStandard.
